name: Project: Square Dude
description:
This game, is well, about a blue square that likes to shoot red squares. Literally, just run around shooting red squares and stuff. Pretty epic. It's also very bullet hell like, so be prepared to move quickly.

The current version of the game was rushed out in about a week, and as a matter of fact this is the first game I have ever created. I hope that you guys enjoy it!
